attributes.action: Re-instate the death penalty for murder. Enough is enough.
attributes.additional_details: So far in 2018 London has over taken New York for murders. Is this the society we want to live in or pass on to our kids? We need to make a stand and vote to re-instate capital punishment. Enough is enough. Life is sacred so let’s all cherish it!
attributes.background: We have had enough of the stabbings & shootings. We need a deterent to murder. If you are prepared to take a life then be prepared to have your life taken. Until then no one is safe!
